title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Skills: Online Project-Based Social Job Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Social Science Theories and Online Learning Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their learning patterns at least three times using online learning analytics tools (LMS data) and establish improvement plans.

Learners can achieve performance metrics by completing at least two experiential (experiment/simulation), conversational (discussion/feedback), and productive (report writing) tasks each in project-based assignments.
Learners can maintain over 80% engagement in mixed video/text materials, compare content-type effectiveness, and propose optimal learning strategies.
Learners can complete over 70% of assignments without instructor inquiries by demonstrating self-directed problem-solving skills in online learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
